paper_abstract: Let be a finite field of cardinality , a prime number and an extension field of with degree . The structure and canonical form decompositions of semisimple multivariable -linear codes over are presented. Enumeration and construction of these codes are then investigated. Especially, dual codes, self-orthogonality and self-duality of semisimple abelian -linear codes over are studied. Furthermore, self-dual and -self dual semisimple abelian -linear codes over are considered.
